info.title: Esclavizador
info.description: Corporate time tracking utility with multi-tenant support

get.description: Check if the API is running and database is accessible

post.description: Create new user account and organization. Organization name must be unique.

409.description: Email or organization name already exists

422.description: Validation error (weak password, invalid email, etc.)

post.description: Authenticate user and receive JWT tokens (access + refresh)
Get new access token using refresh token

get.description: List all projects in user's organization with optional filtering
List all tasks in user's organization with optional filtering

post.description: Start a new timer for current user

get.description: Get current user's running timer if any

schema.title: Response Get Running Timer Api V1 Time Entries Running Get

post.description: Create a manual time entry (already completed)

get.description: List time entries with optional filtering (workers see own, bosses see all)

parameters.name: start_date

schema.description: Filter by start date (entries >= this date)
schema.title: Start Date

parameters.description: Filter by start date (entries >= this date)

parameters.name: end_date

schema.description: Filter by end date (entries <= this date)
schema.title: End Date

parameters.description: Filter by end date (entries <= this date)

get.description: List all tags in user's organization

delete.description: Hard delete tag (boss only, cascade removes from time entries)

name.description: Tag name (1-100 characters, will be trimmed)
